name: CookBuddy
0:
”Alexa, open Cook Buddy”
”Alexa, start Cook Buddy”
”Alexa, launch Cook Buddy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cook buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des: Cook Buddy fetches internet results for your recipe searches and is powered by search api, we troll through comprehensive list of website to get the best result for your recipe and dynamically generate content from website text. Skill is optimised for Echo show so you get good visual display of what you are cooking. Just enable and start searching the internet for best recipes
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
